entities.name: james
entities.description: James is mentioned as the one who is being asked out by Evans. He is also referred to as 'Prongs' by Sirius.

entities.name: evans
entities.description: Evans is mentioned as the one who is asking James out.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as the one who is being referred to by Sirius. He is also the one who casts a spell on James.

entities.name: lily
entities.description: Lily is mentioned as the one who makes a comment about not wanting to go out with James.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as the one who refers to James as 'Prongs' and tries to distract Snape.

entities.name: snivelly
entities.description: Snivelly is mentioned as someone that James promises not to lay a wand on if Evans goes out with him.

entities.name: giant squid
entities.description: The giant squid is mentioned as something that Lily would rather go out with than James.

relationships.description: James is being asked out by Evans.
Snape casts a spell on James.
Sirius tries to distract Snape while he is casting a spell.
Lily declines James' request to go out with him.
